name: part3
description: package that contains answers to exercises in part 3 of the course

scripts.build:ui: cd .. && cd FullstackOpenEx/part2/phonebook && rm -rf build && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../FullStackOpenEx_03
scripts.deploy: npm run build:ui && cd ~/Projects/Study/FullStackOpenEx_03 && git add . && git commit -m "fix: engine specifics added for exercise 3.21 under part3" && git push
